mapper.select: select reserve_no as reserveNo, store_no as storeNo, store_name as storeName, reserve_date as reserveDate, eat_date as eatDate, eat_time as eatTime, (select count(*) from review rv where rv.reserve_no=r.reserve_no) rStatus from reserve r where member_no = #{memberNo}

select reserve_no as reserveNo, rs.member_no as memberNo, store_no as storeNo, store_name as storeName, reserve_date as reserveDate, eat_date as eatDate, eat_time as eatTime, eat_num as eatNum, visit_status as visitStatus, (select member_name from member m where member_no = rs.member_no) as reserverName from reserve rs where store_no = #{storeNo} order by 5 desc

select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select reserve_no as reserveNo, rs.member_no as memberNo, store_no as storeNo, store_name as storeName, reserve_date as reserveDate, eat_date as eatDate, eat_time as eatTime, eat_num as eatNum, visit_status as visitStatus, (select member_name from member m where member_no = rs.member_no) as reserverName from reserve rs where store_no = #{storeNo} order by 5 desc) r) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) as cnt from reserve where store_no = #{storeNo}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select reserve_no as reserveNo, rs.member_no as memberNo, store_no as storeNo, store_name as storeName, reserve_date as reserveDate, eat_date as eatDate, eat_time as eatTime, eat_num as eatNum, visit_status as visitStatus, (select member_name from member m where member_no = rs.member_no) as reserverName from reserve rs where store_no = #{storeNo} and (select member_name from member m where member_no = rs.member_no) = #{keyword} order by 5 desc) r) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select reserve_no as reserveNo, rs.member_no as memberNo, store_no as storeNo, store_name as storeName, reserve_date as reserveDate, eat_date as eatDate, eat_time as eatTime, eat_num as eatNum, visit_status as visitStatus, (select member_name from member m where member_no = rs.member_no) as reserverName from reserve rs where reserve_no = #{reserveNo}
